post.body: Congratulations! Launch day! I am so proud to be a part of this team. You all are awesome!
That sounds yummy!!
Wow. That is cold!!!
Have you read "The Host" by Stephenie Meyer? Currently, I 'm reading the "Vampire Academy" teen book series. Entertaining.
I very rarely drink soda pop. I am on my 2nd can. That is what I get for staying up until 1am. I should never start a book during a work wk.
Making cookies.
Expense reports done. No more until 2009. WooHoo!
Trying to get into the holiday mood by listening to Christmas tunes. Joy to the World!
Some cool music from i-tunes collection should smooth the rough edges. RELAX!! 1-2-3 deep breath.
It is going to be one of those days! Anything that could go wrong..is going wrong.
Wow! Woke up to snow this morning! Didn't see that one coming in the weather report!
Feeling an allergy attack coming on. Head foggy, eyes watering, sneezing. UGH! I hate Dec-Feb in Austin. Cedar tree season! I get it bad!
Warm weather for most of today. Then a cold front comes through...B-R-R-R.
Husband decided on an untraditional Christmas dinner of HOMEMADE from scratch: chicken enchiladas, charo beans, Spanish rice, & flan.
Heading out to Port O'Connor for the day.
It is cold in Austin today. Woke up to near freezing weather.
There is something seriously wrong when your water bill is 3 times more than your electric bill.
BRRR, it is in the 30s this morning in Austin. Good side, it is sunny and will warm up to 50s. Soup tonight!
Ugh. Cold weather ='s dry air inside the house. Time to bring out the humidifiers. They are so ugly & loud, but at least I don
My cousin is graduating from A&M University. I am so proud of her!! I feel old, I remember when I held in my arms when I was 15 years old.
Well Pepparkakor may be off my list as a cookie gift. cardamom is $13 per spice jar--about the same price as saffron. Wow!
Wondering why stomach is growling. Engrossed in working and lunch passed.
Swarovski has some lovely gift items. Unfortunately, they exceed the per person $$ limit I set. I love the decorations section!
On the way to the Texas coast for a weekend of relaxation.
Friday's always go so s-l-o-w for me. Come on five o'clock!! Get here soon!
Sitting in living rm watching csi las vegas TRYING to read a book. Husband gabbing away. Sigh. Won't get far in chapters tonite.
I am such a lightweight. 1/2 oz of brandy and the eggnog and I have a buzz.
Frrom 35degrees yestersay to 60 degree weather today. Weird Texas weather.
Stray dog wandered into my yard. Poor thing. It is cold. Checked tags...friendly...oh good..dog is only a few blocks from home.
The air is so dry. I keep getting static shock when I touch metal.
I need to NOT visit the Apple App store--spent $20 in 15 mins loading up my iPhone.
My chihuahua loves banana slices. Little runt.
Up to my eyeballs in spreadsheets and invoices. But the quarter is almost closed and I can see light at the end of my paper laden tunnel.
My oatmeal exploded in the microwave. Clean up is messy business.
Man! It is really cold outside. Central Tx usually doesn't get this kind of weather until late January.
5 more work days before I start my 2 wk vacation.
Happy New Year!
My view today. Balmy 65. http://twitpic.com/xygd
tried to have too much fun today -- I had a relapse of my cold. Hate being sick during vacation.
Monday and I don't have to work.
feeling better, but hubby is like a 4 yr old. Why can't u feel good? I want to go do things!! Wahhh!!
Yuck. I've been sick since Christmas Eve.
Grocery store at 3pm was horrible. I walked out with 10% of my list. Couldn't handle the crowd. Tomorrow, getting up early & trying again.
1 hr of getting satellite TV and husband is channel surfing. Dang it...park on a channel!
Finally getting Directv. They could not find out house. Took them two days to find the house.
On the way to Matagorda Beach for a few hours. Tomorrow Temps drop to the 40s. Today temp is 75.
